website_summaries.verdict: A convenient option for making mini donuts, brownies, whoopie pies, and other delectable pastries at home.
pros: Foolproof design makes it simple to make tasty donuts and other desserts in just minutes
Interchangeable surface plates ensure any pastries you make will cook evenly on both sides
cons: May result in pastries that are burnt on the outside and raw in the middle, even if you follow the instructions

customer_reviews.title: Quick mini donuts machine, easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini dessert maker. The pans are really non-stick, no spraying oil needed. I made mini donuts and they were done in minutes, I am able to make a big batch in very little time. You cannot find this mini dessert maker anywhere in Was-mart, Costco or other stores. It's definitely a keeper! Too bad the plates were not dish washer safe, it's not that difficult to wash them by hand anyways. This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous shopper

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted this to work
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this - but there's a new appliance smell for the first several batches, and it only made 5 batches in a row then quit for good. Dead. Luckily there's a good return policy.
customer_reviews.author: catalyst4change

customer_reviews.title: Just bought another
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second Sunbeam mini cake maker. This brand has removable plates which makes clean up much easier. I don't know of any other brand that has this feature. My grandchildren love the first one I bought so today I ordered one for me to replace the one the kids took.
customer_reviews.author: jlsh

customer_reviews.title: Love my mini donuts!
customer_reviews.text: So quick and easy to use and switch out plates....but be careful the black plates are hot! The look like they may be black handles on the side but they're NOT! I love the mini donut maker!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like a bigger boy easy bake oven. Cooks faster on bottom, but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: Storming Bunnies

customer_reviews.title: This was a secret Santa gift
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who got it but it looked like something she really wanted for Christmas. Thank you for the quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: so good! Have only tried the mini doughnuts so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Have only tried the mini doughnuts so far. Looking forward to trying the others!
customer_reviews.author: Angelwings2ltd

customer_reviews.title: Treats quick and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to have all the different options from the same little machine-donuts brownies or whoopie pies! Love them all! We use ours with Trim Healthy Mama recipes and everything has been great!
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY FAE VOLRATH

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love coming to my house to make donuts. And I love that I can stick them in the dishwashers
customer_reviews.author: Pgpalmcoast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter and her family just loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Pape

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works really well and it comes with the 3 trays. It's very simple to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: andres

customer_reviews.title: Product came with the wrong plates - 3 whoppie pie ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came with the wrong plates - 3 whoppie pie plates and only one donut plate instead of two of each..
customer_reviews.author: Anh Lan Truong

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but...
customer_reviews.text: I would of give it 5 stars but At first it was great, perfect donuts! Yea! Second batch it wouldn't come back on, wait till cool still nothing, changed outlet still nothing...try other appliances on the outlet, it works. So I was sad and stuck with a batch of batter. I end up having to cook them in the oven, using my donut and cake pop pan. Did not come out that pretty but at least I didn't have to waste my organic and gluten free batter. I will buy it one more time and hope that one was just a defect, fingers cross. Will update when I get the new pan 😀
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: The Teflon coating inside works great. It does have a little weight to it
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy in my kitchen. The Sunbeam mini pie maker is made very well. It stands up to its name. The Teflon coating inside works great. It does have a little weight to it, but not too heavy. It's easy to clean, just a quick wipe down. It arrived with a recipe book as well. You can make 4 mini pies at once. I give it 5 stars. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Joann lopez

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: my friend and i wanted to get a donut maker but we were'nt sure which one to get. i ordered this one and she loved it. now she is getting one too. in the picture it shows three different trays. one of them is a heart. when i got mine it did'nt come with a heart. it came with : mini donuts, brownies and whoopies. it's still really cute. it came with 5 recipies i think. i only tried the first recipie and its really yum. it takes 2 min. for the maker to warm up and 3 min. for it to bake. i think it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shira Messner

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great! This dessert maker is very easy to use. I had no trouble with it at all. The first use was easy and it did not emit any smells or smoke. I followed the instructions and everything went well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: needs a temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Works nice, but needs a temperature control. It gets too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Clark C. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Boxed mixes work well
customer_reviews.text: As a test run used a boxed brownie mix, following the box instructions. Preheated the unit per instructions in manuel. Used oil to brush the tray per fill. Filled the little brownie bites tray maybe 2/3s (had a few overflows but really simple cleaning) cooked for 6 minutes and cooled on a cooling rack. THEY WERE AMAZING. Better than the crap you get at a bakery. I can't wait to try with batter made from scratch!
customer_reviews.author: CouchMom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered....
customer_reviews.text: When I placed my order, I expected what I ordered, not a different brand! This was totally different than the pink unit. I received a purple one in a different brand name, though it was the same type that was supposed to have 3 different sets of plates, I received 6 sets of plates, and 1 of them was a duplicate, which makes that one unusable! Needless to say, I returned.
customer_reviews.author: scrappygirl

customer_reviews.title: Burned on outside raw on inside.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea but did not cook the whoopie pies or brownies. Burned on the outside and raw on inside See pic
customer_reviews.author: CRF222

customer_reviews.title: Having a lot of fun making mini donuts and mini whoopee pies
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in the time that was stated. Having a lot of fun making mini donuts and mini whoopee pies, have not tried the min brownies yet, but will soon! Only had one small problem, the first time I did the mini donuts the plates kept coming off. I finally realized there were slots that the plates needed to be placed into first (nowhere in the instructions was that stated). That is the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roth

customer_reviews.title: One of the best mini donut makers
customer_reviews.text: Was rated as one of the best mini dessert makers due to its interchangeable plates and easy cleaning. Grandkids love making donuts and cupcakes with this. Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too tiny. I gave it away to someone I thought might use it, I don't think they have
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Sunbeam dessert maker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Plates change to offer different shaped treats. A little hard to pipe the batter into just the shape you want but it works.Enjoyed the process.
customer_reviews.author: LoriBeede

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: haven't tried it yet but love the different plates that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: wicked

product_meta.title: Sunbeam Mini Dessert Maker
product_meta.description: The foolproof way to make mouth-watering mini-brownies, donuts or whoopie pies in just minutes! Normally, it can take an hour or more to whip up a tasty dessert for your family. Now you can make perfect mini-brownies, mini donuts or mini whoopie pies in a fraction of the time with this Sunbeam mini dessert maker! Just fill one of the non-stick dishwasher safe trays with batter, close the lid and in just 8 minutes or less, you have 6 hot, fresh desserts that will thrill your family! Features 3 sets or interchangeable (brownie, whoopie and donut) dual cooking surface plates that cook both sides evenly and self locking lid for safety. Recipes included. 10" diameter x 4"H. 1-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Makes delicious mini brownies, mini donuts and mini whoopee pies
By Sunbeam, a brand trusted over 100 years
Bring your mini dessert ideas to life
Includes brownie, donut and whoopee pie plates

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars

categories: Electric Cake Pop & Mini Cake Makers
